path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Solidity_Finance/TribeOne Smart Contract Audit by Solidity Finance.pdf

findings.title: Centralization of Control
findings.description: The owner and Admins have excessive permissions, including the ability to transfer ownership and grant/revoke admin privileges, as well as withdraw any amount of funds from the AssetManager contract.

findings.title: Improper Authorization Scheme
findings.description: The owner or an Admin can withdraw any amount of funds from the AssetManager contract.
